CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 31, 1958, pg. 7, reads: "150 Youth Hear Expert Advice on Job Preparation at NAACP Career Confab - Successful NAACP Conference - Youth of the area were able to secure career guidance and counseling from panelists at the Career Conference on the Development of Industrial and Scientific Skills, held last Saturday in Student Union Building of the University of Pittsburgh, under the direction of the Pittsburgh Chapter of the NAACP. Several workshops were held similar to the one above concerning clerical and related fields which was left by Lorenzo Hill, controller of The Pittsburgh Courier. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Lorenzo Hill addressing women seated in chairs, at workshop during NAACP career conference, University of Pittsburgh Student Union
